strapiPost.title: Meaux Beignet, A Powdered Bite To Remember
strapiPost.content:
Last Friday, the NWA Daily team had the chance to try out some local restaurants at the BITE LITE event in downtown Rogers. There was one we found ourselves going back to for 'Meaux'.

  • Sweet treat: Bringing a New Orleans delicacy to NWA, Meaux Beignet is frying and serving up French style donuts to NWA and just celebrated their one-year birthday. They are a food truck stationed at Bentonville Brewing Company and they're absolutely delicious.
  • Powdered: Next time in Bentonville, we highly recommend stopping by for a taste of their Original or Ozark Beignet. They also do online ordering, catering, and are available for special events.

Learn more about Meaux Beignet's HERE ... or go try it for yourself!
